subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
organizations: State University of New York at Binghamton
lead_paragraph: The Binghamton University adjunct who accused the athletic department of giving preferential treatment to basketball players and pressuring her to change her grading policy for players was dismissed.
snippet: The Binghamton University adjunct who accused the athletic department of giving preferential treatment to basketball players and pressuring her to change her grading policy for players was dismissed.
